about_the_game:
Experience the calming tranquility of blowing thousands of leaves around in Leaf Blowing Simulator, the only real-time physics-based simulator that allows you to effortlessly create your own virtual oasis. Shape nature at your own pace and find relaxation in the gentle flow of leaves.

BLOW THE STRESS AWAY

Whether you're a laid-back or meticulous player, this game is for everyone. Immerse yourself in a calming atmosphere, as you clean up rooftops, alleys, and open fields. Sit back, relax, and watch the wind sweep your stress away.

DON'T BE-LEAF IT UNTIL YOU TRY IT

While you put off doing your actual yard work, marvel at the intricate details of nature. Watch in awe as thousands of individually simulated leaves blow away with the click of a button.

LEAF IT UP TO YOU

Whether you want to take it slow and gather little groups at a time or create a huge pile to jump into, the world is your canvas. Experience the world your way as you clean up the world one leaf at a time.
